Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class CLIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.CLIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class CLIView extends Object implements View
This class manages the CLI view of a specific client, reading input and sending specific messages to the server

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    CLIView(ServerHandler serverHandler)
    Constructor Initializes this client view.

      public void playerSetUp(boolean requestAgain)
      Asks the client its nickname
      Specified by:
      playerSetUp in interface View
      Parameters:
      requestAgain - if is it true, the client inserts a nickname which has already been chosen, so it has to choose another

    • refreshLobbies

      public void refreshLobbies(List<String[]> lobbies, boolean firstLobby)
      Creates a new lobby if there are no other present, otherwise prints the list of available lobbies and asks which one the client wants to join
      Specified by:
      refreshLobbies in interface View
      Parameters:
      lobbies - the list of the names of the lobbies present
      firstLobby - a flag which is true only if there are no lobbies

      Parameters:

    • printWinner

      public void printWinner(String winner1, String winner2, String nickname)
      Prints the winner of the game, then calls newGame(String) method
      Specified by:
      printWinner in interface View
      Parameters:
      winner1 - the nickname of the winner
      winner2 - the nickname of the eventual second winner in case of draw. It may be null if there is only one winner
      nickname - the nickname of the client

    • printInterrupt

      public void printInterrupt(String nickname, boolean notEntered)
      Informs the client, while it is choosing a lobby, if that lobby is no more available because of a disconnection of one of the player in the lobby, otherwise calls newGame(String) method
      Specified by:
      printInterrupt in interface View
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player disconnected
      notEntered - true if the client is not entered in the lobby

    • newGame

      public void newGame(String nickname)
      Asks the client if it wants to start a new game
      Specified by:
      newGame in interface View
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player disconnected, if present. It may be null

      public void printServerDown()
      Informs the client that the game is ended due to a problem with the server
